name: cams
description: Bankruptcy Oversight Support System - Parent Project

scripts.start:backend: pushd backend && npm run start && popd
scripts.start:frontend: pushd user-interface && npm run start && popd
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: pushd backend && npm run build && npm run build:api && npm run build:migration && popd
scripts.build:frontend: pushd user-interface && npm run build && popd
scripts.build:common: pushd common && npm run build && popd
scripts.clean-and-build: npm run clean:all && npm run ci:all && npm run build
scripts.lint:ci: npm run lint:common && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ui && npm run lint:dev-tools && npm run lint:e2e
scripts.lint:common: cd common && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:ui: cd user-interface && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:dev-tools: cd dev-tools && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:e2e: cd test/e2e && npm run lint && cd ../..
